title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 372.6 - Appeal of denial of a permit application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 372.6 - Appeal of denial of a permit application

State Regulations

An applicant may appeal a denial of a permit application
by writing the Commissioner of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation, 625

Broadway, Albany, NY 12233. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
372.6

Amended

New

York State Register March 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 10, eff. 3/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
